subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In addition to a deal with the ace left-hander C. C. Sabathia, the Yankees have also told A. J. Burnett that they would offer him a five-year contract.
snippet: In addition to a deal with the ace left-hander C. C. Sabathia, the Yankees have also told A. J. Burnett that they would offer him a five-year contract.
